mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM base_dict t LEFT JOIN base_dict_type a ON t.type = a.id WHERE t.del_state = 0 AND a.del_state = 0 AND a.`code` = #{dictTypeCode} ORDER BY t.sort ASC
SELECT t.* FROM base_dict t LEFT JOIN base_dict_type dt ON t.type = dt.id WHERE dt.del_state = 0 AND t.del_state = 0 AND dt.`code` = #{dictTypeCode} AND t.text = #{dictText} ORDER BY t.sort ASC
SELECT t.* FROM base_dict t LEFT JOIN base_dict_type dt ON t.type = dt.id WHERE dt.del_state = 0 AND t.del_state = 0 AND dt.`code` = #{dictTypeCode} AND t.value = #{dictValue} ORDER BY t.sort ASC
